cause.description:
respect the game, today.
1. The game is a very valuable member of our society, and must be respected.
2. You must love your neighbor, and your neighbor is the game.
3. Hey, respect the game.
4. The game and respect have become divided.
5. There's a fine line between respect and the game.
cause.mission: respect the game with all our minds, with all our souls, and with all our hearts
cause.name: Respectin the Game
